languages.text: "Думаю, пируют в чертоге героев со Всеотцом. И рога их полны мьода, как полны были отваги и верности их сердца".
"Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, пируют в чертоге героев со Всеотцом. И рога их полны мьода, как полны были отваги и верности их сердца".

traits.locale_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “我猜，他们应该是在英雄圣殿里与全父共享盛宴吧。他们生前充满了英勇与忠诚，如今角杯里也装满了蜜酒。”
languages.original_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."

traits.locale_text: “我猜，他们应该是在英雄圣殿里与全父共享盛宴吧。他们生前充满了英勇与忠诚，如今角杯里也装满了蜜酒。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「英雄の間で全知の父と宴の最中だろうな。あいつらの胸に満ちてる勇気と忠誠さながらに、ミョードを角笛になみなみ注いでるぜ」
languages.original_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."

traits.locale_text: 「英雄の間で全知の父と宴の最中だろうな。あいつらの胸に満ちてる勇気と忠誠さながらに、ミードを角笛になみなみ注いでるぜ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Que yo sepa, festejando en el salón de los héroes con el Padre de todas las cosas. Tendrán los cuernos rebosando de mjod, del mismo modo que sus corazones rezuman valentía y lealtad».
languages.original_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."

traits.locale_text: «Que yo sepa, festejando en el salón de los héroes con el Padre de todas las cosas. Tendrán los cuernos rebosando de mjod, del mismo modo que sus corazones rezuman valentía y lealtad».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « J'imagine qu'ils festoient dans le hall des héros avec le Père de Tous, vidant leurs cornes remplies à ras bord de mjod, comme la bravoure et la loyauté emplissaient leurs cœurs. »
languages.original_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine qu'ils festoient dans le hall des héros avec le Père de Tous, vidant leurs cornes remplies à ras bord de mjod, comme la bravoure et la loyauté emplissaient leurs cœurs. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Es tafelt mit dem Allvater in den Hallen der Helden, nehme ich an. Die Hörner randvoll mit Mjod, so wie zuvor Mut und Treue ihre Herzen füllten."
languages.original_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Es tafelt mit dem Allvater in den Hallen der Helden, nehme ich an. Die Hörner randvoll mit Mjod, so wie zuvor Mut und Treue ihre Herzen füllten."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Yücebaba'nın kahramanlar salonunda ziyafet çekiyorlardır. Yüreklerine sığmayan yiğitlik ve sadakatleri gibi boynuzlarından içtikleri mjoy da midelerine sığmıyordur."
languages.original_text: "Feasting with the Allfather in the hall of heroes, I reckon. With mjod filling their horns to the brim, as valour and loyalty did fill their hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Yücebaba'nın kahramanlar salonunda ziyafet çekiyorlardır. Yiğitlik ve sadakat yüreklerini doldururken boynuzları ağzına kadar mjod ile doludur."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
